channel.title: Music – Samantha Barks
channel.description: Recent content in Samantha Barks on Music

item.title: Samantha Barks - On My Own ("Les Miserables")
item.description:
작곡: Claude.., Alain Boublil / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 79182

On my own pretending
he’s beside me
All alone I walk
with him till morning
Without him I feel
his arms around me
And when I lose my way
I close my eyes
And he has
found me
In the
rain
The pavement shines
like silver
All the lights
are misty in the river
In the
darkness
The trees are
full of starlight
And all I see is
him and me
Forever
and forever
And I know
it’s only in my mind
That I’m talking to
myself and not to him
And although I know
that he is blind
Still I say
there’s a way for us
I love
him
But when the night is
over
He is
gone
The river’s
just a river
Without
him
The world around me
changes
The trees are bare and
everywhere
The streets are
full of strangers
I love
him
But every day
I’m learning
All my
life
I’ve only been
pretending
Without me his world
would go on turning
A world that’s
full of happiness
That I have
never known
I love him
I love him
I love him
but only on my own
